entities.name: luna
entities.description: Luna is introduced as she appears holding Pigwidgeon's cage in her arms.

entities.name: pigwidgeon
entities.description: Pigwidgeon is introduced as a tiny owl that Luna is holding.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as he responds to Luna's introduction of Pigwidgeon.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as he asks Ron about the horse things.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as she is already sitting in the carriage.

entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as she is already sitting in the carriage.

relationships.description: Harry and Ron are having a conversation about horse things.
Luna is holding Pigwidgeon's cage in her arms.
Harry and Ron are having a conversation about horse things.
Luna is described as saying that Pigwidgeon is a sweet little owl.
Ron and Harry are having a conversation about horse things.
Harry is observing the winged horse.
Ron is perceiving the winged horse for the first time.
